channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Long-term selfish (and the circles of us and now)

item.title: 61% Of Americans Too Afraid To Ride In Self-Driving Cars
item.description: Six out of ten American drivers are afraid to ride in a self-driving car. Meanwhile, Waymo is up past 150,000 paid autonomous rides per week.

item.title: Lab Wars: Is AI Coming For Your White Coat? 3 Implications
item.description: An AI co-scientist platform from Google has the potential to radically improve R&D productivity.

item.title: Elevate Your CATAN Game Night Into A Masterpiece Experience
